name: Asteroid Arcade
description:
Shoot lasers in space because a fish told you to. Asteroid Arcade is a side-scrolling space shoot-em-up which tells the story of a man side-scrolling in space and shooting-em-up. This game has at least 2 characters in it.

Features

  • A story campaign with at least 6 Different Levels (there's 11)
  • An Endless mode with 6 different ships to unlock
  • A story told with branching dialogue trees
  • Partial controller support (a keyboard is only required to type in a custom name for your save profile), cloud saves, stats, and achievements
